page.title: 13Birdingbury,Annual Events
page.content: Every year a village fete is held in Birdingbury.The event involves six-a -side soccer,clay pigeon shooting,side shows and a grand draw.The daytime fun is followed in the evening by a Barn Dance where food is served in the open air from a barbecue.The riverside is an attractive position for the day's activities. In the village of Marton an annual Flower Festival is held in June. Everyone brings early summer blooms to the church and they are arranged into attractive displays by the local women.The whole church is filled with the arrangements and a special service is held.It is a very beautiful event.
